About Dr Adrian Laurence

New Zealand GP & accredited lifestyle medicine doctor helping men over 35 optimize their health through evidence-based strategies.

My Story

I'm a New Zealand GP with over 17 years of experience and an accredited lifestyle medicine doctor through the Australasian Society of Lifestyle Medicine. My journey into lifestyle medicine began when I noticed a pattern in my practice: men over 35 were struggling with the same health challenges, and traditional approaches weren't always enough.

As a father and runner myself, I understand the challenges of balancing health, family, and career. This personal experience, combined with my clinical expertise, drives my approach to helping men optimize their health without extremes.

My Approach

Evidence-Based, Not Dogmatic

I believe tactics are tools, not dogma. Every recommendation I make is grounded in peer-reviewed research and aligned with New Zealand health guidelines. But I also recognize that what works in a research study might not work in your real life.

Education-Focused

This website provides educational content only. I'm not providing personalized medical advice online, and this content is not a substitute for your own clinician. My goal is to help you understand the science so you can make informed decisions about your health.

Practical Implementation

I focus on strategies that work within the constraints of busy schedules, family commitments, and modern life. No extreme diets, no unsustainable practices, no one-size-fits-all solutions.

Men's Health Specialization

My focus is specifically on men over 35 who want to optimize energy, strength, sleep, and longevity. This isn't about vanity metricsâ€”it's about building a foundation for a long, healthy, active life.

Credentials & Experience

Medical Qualifications

  • MBChB (Otago)
  • Fellow of the Royal New Zealand College of General Practitioners
  • Diploma in Lifestyle Medicine (Australasian Society of Lifestyle Medicine)

Professional Experience

  • 17+ years as a General Practitioner
  • Accredited Lifestyle Medicine Doctor
  • Men's Health Specialist
  • Regular speaker on lifestyle medicine topics

I continue to stay current with the latest research in lifestyle medicine, men's health, and preventive care. My clinical practice informs my educational content, and my educational work enhances my clinical practice.

Join my weekly newsletter where I break down the latest research and share actionable tactics for men over 35 who want to optimize their health.
